body.name: Glorto GeForce GT 730 4G Low Profile Graphics Card, 2X HDMI, DP, VGA, DDR3, PCI Express 2.0 x8, Entry Level GPU for PC, SFF and HTPC, Compatible with Windows 11
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 37 mins
features: Powered by NVIDIA GeForce GT 730, 28nm GK208 chipset process with 902MHz core frequency, integrated with 4096MB DDR3 memory and 64-bit bus width
More stable performance, compatible with Win11, can automatically install new driver
Support NVIDIA Surround technology for 4 screens output by dual HDMI and VGA / DP. HDMI Max Resolution-2560x1600, VGA Max Resolution-2048x1536, DP Max Resolution-2560x1600
Support DirectX 12, OpenGL 4.6, CUDA, OpenCL, DirectCompute and DirectML
Original half height bracket matches with the low profile brackets make the Glorto GeForce GT 730 graphics card fit well with all PC tower, small form factor and HTPC(except micro form factor)
body.description: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 4GB Dual HDMI DDR3 64Bit PCI Express 2.0 Low Profile Video Card with 4 Display Ports for Graphics Works/Home Entertainments/Light Games Enjoy all your videos and pictures at HD resolutions, speed up your PC experience With 4096MB of memory capacity, this graphics card can meet the demands of home entertainment, light gaming, and office tasks. Offers 2 HDMI, DP and VGA interfaces, making the video card easy to connect different types of displays. The DVI interface is suitable for digital signals, while the VGA interface is suitable for analog signals, and the HDMI interface supports high-definition video transmission. Features the half-height low-profile design that making it compatible with various computer cases, especially SFF tower match with the included brackets.

productInformation.value: 5.0 5.0 out of 5 stars 4 ratings 5.0 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Glorto GeForce GT 730 4G, features four display ports, this graphics card offers maximum connectivity and flexibility, allowing you to connect multiple monitors without any hassle. Built on the new gen NVIDIA architecture, ensuring optimal performance for even the most graphics-intensive games. It's designed for high-definition gaming, giving you the smoothest and most immersive visuals possible. With its 4GB memory, the Glorto GeForce GT 730 provides the necessary bandwidth for high-speed multitasking and ensures seamless performance even in the most resource-intensive games. Boasting a whisper-quiet cooling system, the Glorto GeForce GT 730 4G keeps your graphics card cool and reliable even during extended gaming sessions. The cooling system efficiently removes heat from the card's vital components, ensuring stable performance over time. It also features a power-saving design that allows you to save money on your electricity bill while still enjoying high-performance gaming.

NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 4GB Dual HDMI DDR3 64Bit PCI Express 2.0 Low Profile Video Card with 4 Display Ports for Graphics Works/Home Entertainments/Light Games Enjoy all your videos and pictures at HD resolutions, speed up your PC experience With 4096MB of memory capacity, this graphics card can meet the demands of home entertainment, light gaming, and office tasks. Offers 2 HDMI, DP and VGA interfaces, making the video card easy to connect different types of displays. The DVI interface is suitable for digital signals, while the VGA interface is suitable for analog signals, and the HDMI interface supports high-definition video transmission. Features the half-height low-profile design that making it compatible with various computer cases, especially SFF tower match with the included brackets. What You Will Get: Glorto GeForce GT 730 4GB Dual HDMI Graphics Card x1 Low Profile Brackets x2
Support Windows 11 and the Latest Version Driver

Speed up your PC experience when you upgrade from integrated graphics to the new NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 4G dedicated card. Enjoy all your videos and pictures at HD resolutions, with 8X faster video editing, 9X faster photo editing, and 5X faster web browsing compared to integrated graphics. Discover 3X faster gaming performance than integrated graphics, making all your gameplay richer and smoother. You can even get the latest drivers and optimize game settings with a single click using GeForce Experience. Glorto GeForce GT 730 4G is everything you need for a better, faster PC experience.
What Glorto GeForce GT 730 Can Do: Four Screens Display Graphics & Video Editing Office Working

Specification GPU Name GK208 Memory Format 4GB DDR3 64 bits Ports 2 HDMI / DP / VGA CUDA Core 384 GPU Clock 902 MHz Memory Clock 500 MHz Boost Clock 902 MHz Slot PCI Express x8 2.0 DirectX Support DirectX 12(11_0) Maximum Digital Resolution 2560x1600 Computing OpenCL / CUDA / DirectCompute / DirectML Technologies OpenGL 4.6 / Vulkan / PhysX

Troubleshooting Tips The following troubleshooting tips may help if you experience problems. Contact GLORTO for more advanced troubleshooting information. Check that the card is seated properly in the PCI Express slot.Ensure that the display cable is securely fastened to the card's display connector.Make sure that the monitor and computer are plugged in and receiving power.If necessary, disable any built-in graphics capabilities on your motherboard. For more information, consult your computer's manual or manufacturer. (NOTE: Some manufacturers do not allow the built-in graphics to be disabled or to become the secondary display.)Make sure you selected the appropriate display device and graphics card when you install the graphics driver.Restart your computer. Press on your keyboard after system starts up. When the Windows Advanced Options Menu appears, select Safe Mode and press . After getting into Safe Mode, in Device Manager check whether the driver for the graphics card is correct.If you are not able to find the desired monitor color/resolution settings: The color and screen resolution options available for selection depend on the graphics card being installed. If necessary, adjust your monitor's setting using monitor's adjust panel to make the screen look focused, crisp, and sharp. (Please refer to the monitor's manual.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lot of bang for the buck
reviews.reviewText: I needed a video card to drive a second monitor. This was easy to configure, and it works like a charm on my Windows 11.
